meanings.sent1: The suitcase was at its fullest with all my clothes packed inside.
meanings.sent2: She smiled her fullest smile when she saw her favorite dessert.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was at its fullest during the surprise party for the teacher.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt fullest when he was surrounded by loved ones.
meanings.sent5: The garden was at its fullest bloom in the springtime.

meanings.definition: To the greatest extent or degree.
meanings.sent1: He wanted to live life to the fullest and explore new places.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed the concert to the fullest by dancing and singing along.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail to the fullest when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: She embraced the challenge to the fullest and achieved great success.
meanings.sent5: The athlete pushed himself to the fullest during the final sprint of the race.

meanings.definition: Having all the necessary or typical characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The new car model is the fullest representation of modern technology.
meanings.sent2: The painting captures the artist's vision to the fullest with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The recipe was at its fullest when all the ingredients were perfectly measured.
meanings.sent4: Her performance in the play was the fullest expression of her talent.
meanings.sent5: The novel provides the fullest description of the fictional world created by the author.
